name:
Captain America™:
Super Soldier
description:
Become Captain America, the ultimate Super-Soldier, as you face the Red Skull’s army in this gripping original third-person action adventure set in the darkest days of World War II. Wield Captain America’s legendary shield to take out enemies at a distance, interact with your environment, and deflect incoming fire back at foes as you traverse Hydra’s massive castle to save the world from Cap’s villainous archenemies.

Using a highly athletic combat system, spectacular shield attacks, melee combos, and fluid platforming, infiltrate a mysterious castle complex and battle the cunning scientist Arnim Zola, the Hydra Army, and a host of evil enemies under the Red Skull’s control. Move freely through castle battlegrounds that serve as both an acrobatic playground for Captain America’s superhuman abilities and a house of mystery with enemies and danger at every turn.
disclaimer: Please use Parental Controls to restrict 3D access for children 6 and under.
